overview: Max Steel returns in a new action-packed adventure to face his latest rival: former extreme sports star Troy Winter, the only guy Max could never beat. In a race to recover a mysterious and powerful meteorite of crystal, Troy Winter accidentally becomes a new and dangerous villain named Extroyer. Extroyer has the power to "extract and become", can steal their victims their power and strength. With the help of his team in N-Tek and his powerful vehicles, Max will protect the world and face his darkest rival.
title: Max Steel: Dark Rival
